text: My best friend pushed into the pool. I was at my cousins wedding reception, everyone was dressed to impress. The reason was she saw a bee hovering above my head. My aunt had passed me a glass of champagne. Best friends dont always think things through and she gave me a little shove. My cousin said "just a few inches further and you would have landed on the cake."

they fell into a pool during a wedding reception. their friend saw a bee and tried to stop her from being stung. They fell into the water and when they got out gasping for air, they apologised, and the cousin said a few inches more and they'd have landed on the cake.
My best friend pushed me into the pool this was at my cousin wedding Reception where my aunt nearly got stung by a bee my dress was ruined and my friend apologised profusely
her friend pushed her into the swimming pool at her cousins wedding because of a bee. when she got out the cousin said a few inches more and it would have been the cake.
During a wedding a lady was pushed into a swimming pool by her aunt as a bee was close to her. She nearly fell on the wedding cake.

My best friend pushed me into the pool at my cousins wedding because a bee was hovering around my face. My aunt handed me a glass of champagne and told me to be careful. My friend started laughing and the first thing I did was get out and dry off. My cousin said that a few inches closer and I would have fell into the cake.
